audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Education

name: Scribo
short_description:
Scribo je mali editor txt fajlova sa osnovnim funkcijama editora. Napisan je u programskom jeziku Java SE 7. Pored osnovnih funkcija editora, pruza i alat za konverziju latinice u cirilicu i obrnuto. Ovaj mali program je napisan od strane pocetnika bez profesionalnog iskustva sa zeljom da prezentuje svoj rad u cilju nastavka ucenja i daljeg poboljsanja.

Scribo is a small txt files editor with basic editor functions. It is written in Java SE 7. Besides basic editor functions it provides a tool for converting Serbian latin script to cyrilic script and vice versa. This small program is written by a beginner developer with no professional experience with a wish to share its work in order to continue the learning process and further improvements.

Contact: milos92s@yahoo.com
summary: Editor txt fajlova sa osnovnim funkcijama editora.
